name: Pick Your Poison: Anniversary Edition
description:
Remake of the game we made a year ago today. In this fast paced, wave based FPS, survive waves of security robots from the company your escaping eternal employment  from. However, after each wave, you get the option to choose a card. These cards add many modifiers to the game, from new weapons to low gravity. Survive for as long as you can and get a high score!

How To Play

Shoot the computer monitor to begin. Shoot all the enemies until a wave is over and then pick a card by shooting it.

For Oculus Quest users: Please use Sidequest to install the game, more info for setting Sidequest up can be found on their website.

Controls

PC:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Ctrl - Crouch

LMB - Shoot

Scroll Wheel - Change Weapon

R - Reset Cards (For when it's clipped in a wall)

VR (Oculus Touch):

Left Stick - Move

A - Jump

B - Crouch

Left Trigger - Sprint

Right Trigger - Shoot

X - Change Weapon (Down)

Y - Change Weapon (Up)

Menu - Reset Cards (For when it's clipped in a wall)

Left Thumbstick - Quit Game (When Dead)

Right Thumbstick - Restart (When Dead)
